data.name: Tactical Operations Centre
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
Add a 3-operator tactical operations room down in the upper hangar bay.
There are 3 operator stations, 2 loadout stations and two information screens as well as flight ops overview/docking info.
Includes Captain's controlls and 4th bridge terminal by Mr Scoot.
Also adds a 4-cell laser-missile VLS if used with Revolution 1.3.11+
Changes 2024-12-07: - slightly reduce the update frequencly of the lesser used screens (currency, log etc) - set the update frequency of the extra bridge control screen to 1 instead of 4.
